name: In Between Jobs
description:
In Between Jobs is a video game made in 48 hours for the 2021 Texas Game Jam by Team 14.  The game jam theme was "in between". While being "in between jobs" usually means being unemployed, Joe must work at two different jobs at the same time and go in between them to not get fired! Keep the paper stack size at his corporate job low and the customers at his waiting job happy to win.

General Instructions

WASD Movement

Spacebar to interact with tables, kitchen counter, and food

Office Level Instructions

Match the tools to the corresponding paper form (click the tool then click the paper not drag)

Don't let your paper stack get too high!

Kitchen Instructions

Interact with tables to take orders

Interact with the kitchen counter to cook food

Deliver cooked food back to tables

Don't let your customers wait too long to get their food!
